content: this christmas dishcloth crochet pattern is a quick easy and practical christmas crochet pattern that adds to your holiday decor and also makes for a terrific gift about this pattern - it s a great christmas crochet project for beginners as the pattern only uses simple stitches…if you know how to double_crochet single_crochet chain and slip_stitch you can make this holiday dishcloth pattern - you can use any 100% cotton yarn for the belt buckle you can use either 100% cotton yarn or scrubby which is great for washing dishes - the pattern works up really quickly - it makes a great christmas gift that will be loved and actually used
